# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(LiteNPC LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_library(LiteNPC SHARED ""
        src/mod/EventListener.cpp
        src/mod/Command.cpp
        src/mod/Util.cpp
        "src/mod/Util.h")
set_target_properties(LiteNPC PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "LiteNPC")
set_target_properties(LiteNPC PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
set_target_properties(LiteNPC PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(LiteNPC PRIVATE
    src
)
target_include_directories(LiteNPC SYSTEM PRIVATE

target_compile_definitions(LiteNPC PRIVATE
    NOMINMAX
    UNICODE
    ENTT_PACKED_PAGE=128
)
target_compile_options(LiteNPC PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/EHa>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/EHa>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/utf-8>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/utf-8>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/W4>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/W4>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/w44265>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/w44265>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/w44289>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/w44289>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/w44296>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/w44296>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/w45263>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/w45263>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/w44738>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/w44738>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/w45204>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/w45204>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/utf-8>
)
string(REPLACE "/EHsc" "" CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}")
set_target_properties(LiteNPC PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(LiteNPC PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(LiteNPC PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(LiteNPC PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(LiteNPC PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(LiteNPC PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET LiteNPC PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDLL")
endif()
target_link_libraries(LiteNPC PRIVATE
    LeviLamina
    fmt
    leveldb
    snappy
    SymbolProvider
    bedrock_server_api
    bedrock_server_var
)
